morningIntro: Another blessed morning is upon us
We have been graced with another {adjectives.positive?} morning
sleepyMorningIntro: {!Sorry|My bad} everyone, I forgot to set my alarm!
Late for work... what should I tell my boss?
{!Ughhh|Oh man}, {!shouldn't have had all that carrot juice last night|I'm gonna yiik}...
My eyelids feel heavy as concrete today.
The {phrases.passing?}, the {phrases.passing?}, and GMBR is {!sleeping in|late for work|running late|being a lazy bum}.
wellWish: May every step you take be filled with {nouns.positive?1-3}
I {!hope|wish that|pray} you find {nouns.positive?1-2} today
I {!hope|wish that|pray} your day is filled with {nouns.positive?1-2}
May this {!day|morning} {!bring to|gift|bestow upon} you {nouns.treasure?}
Count your blessings and {!recognize|remember} that life is a {!treasure|wonderful gift}
I have a {!feeling|hunch} that today will be all about {nouns.positive?}
Cherish your {!friends|fellow Discord users|fellow MCMP dogs}, for they are a blessing
Each day is an opportunity to grow. I hope you make the most of it
Every morning brings you new hopes and new opportunities. Don’t miss any one of them while you’re sleeping
Wake up and make yourself a part of this {adjectives.beautiful?} morning. A {!beautiful|wide|whole} world is {!waiting|there} outside your door.
Welcome this {adjectives.beautiful?} morning with a smile on your face
I hope {!you'll|you|you all} have a great day today
There is no way you can miss the {!beauty|radiance|brilliance} of today’s morning. Wake up, my {!dear|dogs|dearest dogs}. I wish this message be your {!alarm|motivation} for today.
It’s time to wake up, take a deep breath, and enjoy the {!sweetness|wonder|beauty} of nature with all your heart
Mornings define our day. It’s all about how we start every morning. So, get up and make a good start of yet another {adjectives.beautiful?} day
Breathing in the fresh morning air makes you healthier and wiser. Don’t ignore the blessings that every morning offers to us
You have been blessed with yet another day. What a {adjectives.positive?} way of welcoming the blessing with such a {adjectives.beautiful?} morning
May you have a day full of {!sweet|tasty|joyous} wonders ahead
Sending you good vibes to start your morning with positive energy
May your day {!shine|be} as bright as the sun is today
Nothing is more refreshing than a {adjectives.beautiful?} morning that calms your mind and gives you reasons to smile
Welcome the blessings of this {adjectives.beautiful?} {!morning|world}
Wake up like the sun every morning and light up the world with your awesomeness. You have so many great things to achieve today
No matter how {!hard|difficult} yesterday was, today is a new beginning
May the freshness of this morning keep your mind fresh and calm the whole day
A new day has come with so many new opportunities for you. Grab them all and make the best out of your day
The darkness of night has ended. {!A new|Today's} sun is up there to guide you towards life so bright and blissful
The {phrases.passing?} and the {phrases.passing?}, more reasons to stop and appreciate the beauty of this precious world we live in
The {phrases.passing?}, the {phrases.passing?}, and {!you|YOU} my {nouns.alliterativeTitle?}s are starting a new and exciting day!
Count all your blessings, you {!may|surely} have {!more|many more|a lot more} than you {!realize|think}
Count all your {nouns.positive?} friendships and {!be thankful|be grateful|show gratitude} for them, for many of {!them|these dogs|these fellows} share the same first name
seasonUpdate: We are {!deep|well} into season **{$season}**, and {$top} is in the lead with {$second} {!not far behind|on his tail}!
Let's all {!acknowledge|thank|recognize} {$top} for spreading the most Good Morning {!cheer|spirit} in season **{$season}**
It's season **{$season}** and so far, {$top} has been showing the {!most|strongest} Good Morning spirit
It's season **{$season}** and so far, {$top} and {$second} are poised to {!grab|snag|earn} gold and silver medals. Will you let this happen?
Thanks to {$top} for blessing our mornings throughout season **{$season}**
If saying Good Morning were a {!game|contest|tournament}, {$top} would be winning season **{$season}**!
Saying Good Morning is a {!game|contest|tournament}, and {$top} is currently the king of season **{$season}**!
{$top} is currently the {!top dog|king|big dog} of Good Morning season **{$season}**! There's still time to steal the {!title|crown}...
{$top} is currently the {!top dog|king|big dog} of Good Morning season **{$season}**! Though {$second} isn't far behind...
{$top} is leading the pack in Good Morning season **{$season}**! ...but for how long?
{$top} is leading the pack in Good Morning season **{$season}**! ...but how long until {$second} snags first place?
earlyEnd: I have {!an appointment|a hot date|to see the dentist} at noon so I'll be heading out {$when}
Please note that I'll be {!out of here|heading out} today {$when}
I'm {!very|quite} busy today so this morning will be cut short {$when}
Stay focused, for today I will be heading back to {!sleep|bed} {$when}

grumpyMorning: {!Hello|Hey|Morning} everyone, honestly I'm not feeling too {!good|great} {!this morning|today}... I encourage you all to say good morning, but the first {!one|person} to say it is gonna {!piss me off|irritate me|really bug me}.
leaderShift: {$old} is no longer the {!king|prince} of spreading Good Morning cheer, that title now belongs to {$new}!
{$new} has stolen the crown from {$old}! But how long until it's taken by someone else...?
Well well well... it looks like {$old} is no longer the Good Morning king. {$new} is now in the lead!
{$old} was once the {!expert|master} of saying Good Morning, but not anymore... {$new} is now the top dog.
{$old} has let us down... {$new} is now picking up the slack to make our mornings {adjectives.positive?}
We once looked up to {!dear old|good old|sweet|ol'} {$old} as the one to brighten our mornings... but now we will look up to {$new}!
Oh how the mighty have fallen... {$old} is no longer the bringer of good mornings, for that title now belongs to {$new}!
Nice job {$new}, you're stealing the {$old} thunder!
Congrats {$new}, you're making {$old} look like a Good Morning {!slob|loser|deadbeat}
The {!rankings|leaderboards} have shifted, and {$new} has {!stolen|taken} the lead from {$old}!
{$new} is now in first place, stealing the position from {$old}
{$old} was once in first place, but that position has been {!stolen|taken|snagged} by {$new}!
{$old} is no longer in first place! {$new} is now the Good Morning {!top dog|leader|MVP|swaglord}... but for how long?
{$new} has taken the title of {!1st|first} from {$old}... but how long will it be held?
Oh how the tables have turned! {$new} has replaced {$old} as the leader of the pack.
{$new} has been radiating {nouns.positive?} more so than {$old}
{$new} is exemplifying {nouns.positive?} and {nouns.positive?} more so than {$old}, putting {$new} in the lead!
Throughout this Good Morning journey, {$old} has shown much {!bravery|courage}. However, {$new} has more recently shown us the true meaning of {nouns.positive?}!
If your mornings have felt more {adjectives.positive?} recently, you can thank {$new}! {$old} has surrendered the title of {!first|1st} to this dear friend.
This Good Morning adventure of ours has brought us {nouns.treasure?}, and for that we could thank {$old}. However, {$new} has recently been making our mornings even brighter!
I want to thank {$old} for doing so much to make our mornings {adjectives.positive?}, but now it looks like {$new} is the one we should be thanking!
{$old} has passed the torch of bright mornings to {$new}, I await even brighter mornings ahead...

standard: Good morning to you as well!
{!Glad|Happy|Pleasure} to hear from you this morning!
Good morning, how are you {!feeling|faring} {!today|this morning}?
Good morning, any plans for today?
Good morning, such a pleasure hearing from you today, my {nouns.alliterativeTitle?}
question: Good question!
Interesting question... what {!does everyone else|you all} think?
Hmmmmm {!I'm not sure|hard to say}
Yes, {!absolutely|definitely}!
Yes! Yes! Yes!
I {!think|believe} so!
I don't {!think|believe} so
Most certainly not!
new: Good morning, {!glad|happy} to {!hear from you|see you around here}!
{!Hello|Hi there|Greetings}! May this {adjectives.positive?} morning be the first of many...
It's always {!wonderful|a blessing|serendipitous} to see a {!fresh|new} face here... Good morning!
Welcome! {!Pleasure|Pleased} to meet you on this {!nice|fine} morning, my friend
Good morning! To meet a new friend is truly a miracle, {!treasure this moment|may today treat you well}
{!It is|'Tis} a {!blessed|wondrous} morning, for a new {!friend|dog} has joined {!the|our special} game
negative: Good morning, {!didn't expect|wasn't expecting} to hear from you
You may be a {!naughty|bad} {!boy|dog|man}, but good morning to you!
Well, well, well... look who's up!
We are all {!given|afforded} the {!chance|opportunity} to redeem ourselves, I respect your {!humility|bravery}
We've all made mistakes {!in the past|before}, it's up to us to {!do right by those we've wronged|seek forgiveness}. Good morning!
Looks like someone learned what morning {!is|means}!
comboBreaker: Good morning! A {$days}-day Good Morning {!combo|streak} has been broken, what a sight to see!
Good morning and thank you! You {!have|just} ended the {$days}-day {$breakee} reign of terror.
On this peaceful morning, you have broken {$breakee}'s {$days}-day Good Morning {!combo|streak}!
Good morning! {$breakee} will be sorry to see his {$days}-day {!combo|streak} {!broken|ended|turned to dust|in pieces}
A very {adjectives.positive?} morning to you! For today marks the end of {$breakee}'s {$days}-day Good Morning {!combo|streak}
The {phrases.passing?}, the {phrases.passing?}, and combos are being broken! {$breakee}'s {$days}-day combo, that is...
For {$days} long mornings, {$breakee} has rushed to wish us a good morning. What you've done just now has {!shown|demonstrated} {!remarkable|incredible} {!bravery|courage|determination}!
video: Thanks for sharing! What a perfect addition to an already {!blessed|splendid} morning
Good morning! I hope everyone views this, for it may bring to life even the most snoozy sleepyheads
Wow! What an interesting {!thing|video} to share on a morning like this!
What does everyone else think of this? Upon viewing, I personally felt a deep sense of {!comfort|appreciation|awe}
Quite the humorous {!video|post}, my friend. You always know how to make us feel better on mornings like this!
Good morning! This {!video|post} will surely make it a good one for all of us
Good morning! To be honest, I was feeling a little {!sleepy|snoozy|me-tired} until I saw your video, gave me a hearty laugh and a bright smile!
Good morning! This is a {adjectives.positive?} video! Who else agrees with me?
unoriginalVideo: I {!have a|get the} feeling {!I've|we've} already seen {!this|this one} before...
It's called Monkey Friday, not Repost Friday!
Oh {!dear|deer}, {!sorry to say|my apologies} but {!I've seen this one already|this is a repost}...
unoriginal: Good morning! Not the most {adjectives.novel?} greeting, but thanks {!anyway|regardless}
Good morning! I feel like I've heard this before, {!though|however}
{!Happy|Glad} to hear from you this morning, but please try {!to|and} say something {!new|original}
Good morning! I appreciate your {!message|kind words|greeting}, but it's not the most {adjectives.novel?}
I hope that next time I hear from you, you'll be saying something more {adjectives.novel?}
I look forward to your next greeting, {!I hope|hopefully} {!it's|it'll be} a little more {adjectives.novel?} than this morning's
I'm having a {adjectives.positive?} morning, but {!truth be told|to be honest|honestly} I'm a little {!off put|bummed|disappointed} by your lack of {!originality|creativity}
My {!friend|dear friend}, we all {!love|appreciate|recognize|respect} you for your {!creative wit|creativity}, but what is this?
I hope {!today|this morning} brings you not only {nouns.positive?1-2} but also {!creativity|originality}... seems like you {!need|could use} it
It's never a complete morning without {!you chiming in|your radiant presence|your kind words}! Although I was hoping you'd say something a little more {adjectives.novel?}...
Good morning! Though something tells me I've heard this before...

Each morning I await your {adjectives.positive?} {!greeting|words} {!oh so eagerly|with bated breath|with such anticipation}, {!but|yet} this morning's greeting {!feels|seems|felt} a little forgettable
absent: Good morning! It's been a while... {!how've you been|what have you been up to}?
Look who it is! I've missed you, my {nouns.alliterativeTitle?}
It's been a {!while|bit} since you've said Good Morning. How's life been?
Happy to hear from you, once again! Anything new with you?
I was starting to miss you, my friend. Has life been treating you well?
A {!truly|very} {adjectives.positive?} morning to you! It's been a while since I've heard from you

early: Begone, you {adjectives.negative?} unfamiliar, for {!I am fast asleep|I have not awoken} 😴
I don't {!know you|know who you are|believe we've met}, but please let me be 😴
I {!was expecting|expected} to be disturbed by a dear friend, not you... 😴
{!I'm sorry|My apologies}... it {!seems|appears} you haven't {!gotten|received} the memo, but I'm not ready yet 😴
Alas, I {!weep|shed a tear}... for your {!first|very first} Good Morning could've been {!filled with|defined by} {nouns.treasure?1-2}, {!but|yet} here we are... 😴
The {phrases.passing?}, the {phrases.passing?}, and {adjectives.negative?} strangers are {!ripping|pulling|yanking} the {!sheets|covers} off my bed while I am sound asleep... 😴
late: A stranger stumbles into the {!chamber|hall} of the Good Morning {!king|prince}... in the afternoon...
If you haven't {!gotten|received} the memo yet, it is currently after-hours
You're new {!here|around here}, so please have your fellow morningtime {!chaps|pals|dogs} explain {!the rules of the game|how this works}

Alas, what a {!shame|pity}... for you've {!only just|just|just now} {!joined us on|joined us for|tagged along for} this Good Morning {nouns.quest?} and you're already {!in the red|slipping|falling behind}
The {phrases.passing?}, the {phrases.passing?}, and strangers are rapping on my chamber door well after noon...

goodMorning: Good morning to all! Though honestly, this morning I'm thinking of {$player} in particular. Are you there? It's been a while since I've heard from you.
Good morning! I love hearing kind words and well wishes from you all each morning, though it's been a while since I've heard from {$player}. Are you there?
Good morning to all, but specifically to {$player}. It's been a while since I've heard from you. Are you there?
{!Hey|Hello} {$player}, hope you're having {!quite the|a very} {adjectives.positive?} morning! {!I hope|Hopefully} you're still {!alive|breathing|with us}...
beckoning.reply: {beckoning.replyPrefix?}! {beckoning.replySuffix?}. I hope to hear from you more often 🌞
replySuffix: I {!knew|had a feeling} you'd {!reply|respond|get back to me}
So {!glad|relieved} to hear from you, my friend
I was getting a little worried, but I'm glad you're {!ok|okay}
My morning was just made that much {!better|happier}
It wouldn't be a good morning without you
My mornings are made so much more {adjectives.positive?} when you're here

summonPrefix: As this morning comes to a close, I'd like to recognize {$player}'s efforts in making our mornings {!shine bright|special}.
This morning was {!truly|quite} {adjectives.positive?}, but I'm exhausted... I don't think I'll {!be able to wake myself up tomorrow|set my alarm}.

Saying good morning to {!you all|my friends} is {!an honor that I truly cherish|a privilege that I enjoy deeply|the highlight of each day}, but I think I'll {!pass the torch for tomorrow|let someone else give it a shot}!
{!Thank you|Thanks} {!all|everyone|guys} for a {adjectives.positive?} morning, but tomorrow I'd like to {!mix it up|change things up|try something different}.
summonSuffix: {$player}, I'll let you start the Good Morning {!train|ritual} tomorrow. Go ahead and say good morning whenever you'd like, I'll wake up when I see your message
I'd like {$player} to take my place tomorrow morning. Please send a {!truly|wonderfully} {adjectives.novel?} good morning message to the server to kick off the day! Don't wait for me
I'd like to call on {$player} to say Good Morning tomorrow in my place
I hereby {!invite|summon} {$player} to start us off tomorrow

setup: {!Nice|Solid} {!bait|baiting}, let's see {!if it pays off|how it pans out|what happens|if someone falls for it}...
Let's see if {!someone|anyone|some fool} takes the bait, {!good play|devious moves|you schemer}...
reply: Oh {!naw|nah|hell nah} {$player} he really {!done goofed|fumbled|did it|messed up} 😭
{$player}, I think you're gonna {!wanna|want to} see this...
